name: Quiz Leads
author: Bhuvnesh Gupta

sections.description:
Motive This plugin is used to generate leads by taking user through very easy questions.
Admin can choose awesome templates and can edit too.Also you can use any autoresponder form code to get leads.

User will follow through very easy questions created by admin and in the end he will submit the form of autoresponder added by admin, once form is submitted user will be redirected to the Redirect URL (lead url) added by admin. For more details go through the link http://quizleads.io/

Free Version
1. Instant Access To QuizLeads.io Plugin
2. Your First Affiliate Campaign
3. Video Tutorials & Training
4. Use Plugin On 1 Domain

Premium Version
1. Instant Access To QuizLeads.io Plugin
2. Your First Affiliate Campaign
3. Video Tutorials & Training
4. Use Plugin On Unlimited Domain
5. 15 AWESOME templates
6. BONUS: Premium Super Affiliate Campaign

Support I want to develop many of the plugins so I am ready to get reviews and provide support for 24 hours.

Get Pro License at http://quizleads.io/wp
sections.installation:
For a manual installation via FTP:

  1. Extract the downloaded plugin and upload to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in your WordPress admin area

To upload the plugin through WordPress, instead of FTP:

  1. Upload the downloaded zip file on the ‘Add New’ plugins screen (see the ‘Upload’ tab) in your WordPress admin area and activate.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in your WordPress admin area
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

For a manual installation via FTP:

  1. Extract the downloaded plugin and upload to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in your WordPress admin area

To upload the plugin through WordPress, instead of FTP:

  1. Upload the downloaded zip file on the ‘Add New’ plugins screen (see the ‘Upload’ tab) in your WordPress admin area and activate.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in your WordPress admin area

For all the details check training video

http://quizleads.io/wp
